item.title: Optimization Theory: Method of Lagrange Multipliers
item.description: ⚡ 이 포스트는 패스트 트랙Fast Track으로 작성되었습니다. Description In nonlinear optimization problems that have a nonlinear objective function, a method called Lagrangian Multiplier Method involves multiplying constraints by something called Lagrangian Multipliers and integrating them into the objective function. $$ \begin{matrix} \text{Maximize} & f(x) \\ \text{subject to}
